content: I'm looking to get some advice on how to maintain my new area rug. I recently got it from IKEA and I'm really happy with it, but I had a bit of a scare when my friends spilled nachos on it during a game night. I spent a few attempts to remove the stain from the new rug, but the exact time is not specified. What are some general tips on how to keep it clean and stain-free?
